title: goroutine/schedular starvation
body:
by **kbsriram**: 
http://play.golang.org/p/06bz6Td0Mg

Why does only writer1 get scheduled? (Or is the code itself required to account for
potential goroutine starvation?)

[PS: thanks to discussion on freenode/#go-nuts for isolating this specific example.
There are other biases present in an unbuffered channel, but none as interesting as the
previous one. eg: http://play.golang.org/p/g9pxx3R3BV]
